meta.title: Accretence
meta.description: I'm a self-taught Full-Stack Web & Solidity developer.

experiences.title: Learning and Development Specialist
experiences.description: As an academic student studying architecture, I helped transition a traditional design and construction company to a more contemporary and sustainable method of operation in a 6 months L&D program.

experiences.title: Executive Supervisor @IranPharma Int. Expo 2018
experiences.description: As both a fluent English speaker and an architectural student I helped translate for and connect to international attendees and organizers while collaborating with a group of 12 people to execute a Pharmaceutical Exhibition on an international level.

experiences.title: Interior Architect, and BIM Specialist
experiences.description: As a recent Bachelor of Architecture graduate, I was able to join a great team of designers and engineers in an industry-leading company. I was able to bring my 3D Modelling and Rendering skills and improve the company’s presentation capabilities.

experiences.title: UI & UX Designer
experiences.description: In my first experience in the development industry, I was able to work with an amazing group of individuals and web engineers and gain experience in both UI & UX Design, and front-end development. I was given the opportunity to work on several projects including in-house CRM, Resource & Project Management and Analysis, and E-Commerce Platforms from the design phase using tools like Adobe XD and Zeplin to development phase using Bootstrap and Vue.js upholding high standards such as Progressive Web Application, Single Page Applications, and Server Side Rendering.

experiences.title: DeFi Investor
experiences.description: Spent better part of 2 years on becoming a disciplined investor. Pretty self-explanatory.
